tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_monitor (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE chatroom_sentiments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    chatroom_name VARCHAR(50),
    message_content TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);
